original_text: This is what I, the Almighty Lord, say to you, my sheep: I will judge you. I will decide which of you are good and which of you are bad. I will judge between male sheep and goats.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 나의 양 떼 너희여 내가 양과 양 사이와 숫양과 숫염소 사이에서 심판하노라

sentences.original_text: This is what I, the Almighty Lord, say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 내, 전능하신 주가 너희에게 하는 말이다

sentences.original_text: I will decide which of you are good
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 중 선한 자들이 누구인지 결정하겠다

sentences.original_text: and which of you are bad
I will judge between male sheep and goats
